description: Welcome to The Breeze in Burke Mountain! This 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom home has an open, spacious plan with 1,551 sq ft of private living! Enjoy a beautiful kitchen with shaker style cabinetry, granite counters, breakfast bar seating, display shelving and abundant storage. Step out to a  private balcony that overlooks protected green space. Dining and living room seamlessly connect and have a media wall with built-in shelving and a cozy fireplace. Upstairs offers 2 large bedrooms, including the primary having a 4 piece ensuite with frameless glass shower. Laundry up for added convenience. Down has an additional large bedroom and a full bathroom. Greenbelt views and privacy throughout the entire home! Located steps away from transit, trails and the future Burke Mountain Secondary School.
